mapper.sql: SELECT id, userId, available, rating, title, message, url, rtmp_url, rtmp_key, playUrl, preview, category, type, price, link, startTime FROM bvision_channel_live
mapper.select: WHERE available=1 ORDER BY startTime DESC

SELECT bvision_channel_live.id, bvision_channel_live.userId, bvision_channel_live.available, bvision_channel_live.rating, bvision_channel_live.title, bvision_channel_live.message, bvision_channel_live.url, bvision_channel_live.rtmp_url, bvision_channel_live.rtmp_key, bvision_channel_live.playUrl, bvision_channel_live.preview, bvision_channel_live.category, bvision_channel_live.type, bvision_channel_live.price, bvision_channel_live.link, bvision_channel_live.startTime, auth_register_user.username username, auth_register_user.icon userIcon FROM bvision_channel_live, auth_register_user WHERE bvision_channel_live.userId = auth_register_user.id AND bvision_channel_live.available = 1 ORDER BY bvision_channel_live.startTime DESC
WHERE available=1 AND title LIKE concat('%',#{title},'%') ORDER BY startTime DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM bvision_channel_live WHERE userId=#{userId}
mapper.update: INSERT IGNORE INTO bvision_channel_live (title, url, rtmp_url, rtmp_key, playUrl, preview, category, userId) VALUES (#{title}, #{url}, #{rtmpUrl}, #{rtmpKey}, #{playUrl}, '1', '1', #{userId})
